West_Covina.Gladstone High School (California): Gladstone High School is a public high school located at 1340 North Enid Avenue in Covina, California, United States. It is part of the Azusa Unified School District and enrolls 1,366 students. The school was accredited in 2013 and will be through 2019 by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC).
